overview: Harold. Meek. Mild-mannered. Dull. Until a rubber doll named Jamie Summers comes to life. His life. Watch Jamie go sex crazy. Watch Blondie ravage Tony Montana. Watch Sioban join in on a rotating love machine And as Jamie deflates- watch the talking dildo Max vow revenge. Watch "Little Shop of Whores." You'll never look at a rubber girl the same again.
title: Little Shop of Whores
